headline: A Look At Veralto (VLTO) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness And Discount To Fair Value
summary: Veralto at a glance after recent trading performance Veralto (VLTO) has drawn attention after a recent stretch of softer returns, with the stock down over the past week, month, and past 3 months, even as the company reports revenue of US$5.5b and net income of US$940 million. See our latest analysis for Veralto. At a share price of US$92.69, Veralto’s recent 30 day and year to date share price returns show fading momentum, while the 1 year total shareholder return of a 6.71% decline points to...

headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Veralto’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Veralto’s fourth quarter results were met with a negative market reaction, as the company’s revenue came in slightly below Wall Street expectations despite year-on-year growth. Management attributed the shortfall largely to lower volumes caused by three fewer shipping days, as well as macroeconomic headwinds that affected industrial and municipal demand. CEO Jennifer Honeycutt highlighted the resilience of the company’s recurring revenue streams, which make up 60% of sales, and noted that operat
